title: ImportSnare: Directed "Code Manual" Hijacking in Retrieval-Augmented Code Generation
summary: This paper addresses the functional deficiencies and security vulnerabilities in LLM-generated code by proposing ImportSnare, a method that enhances correctness and security through directed "code manual" hijacking in Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).
usefulness_reason: The paper discusses "Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)" and leveraging "external code manuals" to improve code generation. These "code manuals" can be considered a form of contextual dataset that provides relevant information for the task, making it tangentially relevant to 'Contextual dataset'.
